text: Hey <@U39KDAQ9X> still seeing an issue with this? If so, could you DM me with an example link?

Hi all! I have a css file that uses variables defined in that file for the theme colors (we copy/paste the hex values in the css). Is there a way to call variables defined in the head or in a custom module? (use case: allow content editors to define the theme colors for an event page, so whenever an element uses theme_color it pulls that color dynamically instead of requiring someone to clone the css file and copy/paste the desired color value)

We can't use variables in Custom module so I alsways create _customModule.css file and import it in my main stylesheet file for pull the color dynamically.

But in this case we can't get dynamic color in module's preview.
